title: tajhaNu dhIm tarana (t)
sahitya:
tajhaNu dhIm tarana takiTajham taritajham takajham takaNamtari
tajhaNu dhIm tarana tattajjham taritajham takiTatAm tajhaNutAm tari
tajhaNu dhIm tarana tattajjham tarita tatajham tarItAm takundari
tajhaNu dhIm tarana takiTajham tarita takatajjham takatakajjham taka
tajhaNu dhIm tarana takiTajham taritata tajjham taka tatajjham taka 


anupallavi

  dhiranaa dhIm tanana takadhimi taka tajjham tajhaNutAm takiTa taritaka takajham
dhirana dhIm tanana takadhimi taka tajjham tajhaNutAm takiTa taritaka takajham
dhirana dhIm tanana takadhimi takatajjham takundari kiTataka tAtItOm kiTataka tAttOm
kiTatakatOm takajhaNu takundari tatAm tatAm tatAm takatiru tatAm tatAm tatAm takatiku tatAm tatAm tatAm takatiku


caraNam    ninnu nammitrini nIrajAkSi hEma mAlyAlankrtE kOrina varadE shubhadE mahitE
dayanu jUpi nanu brOvavamma shrI kamalavallI krpAkari takatiku taLAngu 
tatikiTatOm takataLAngu tatikiTatOm taLAngu tatikiTatOm
